title: French police arrest man holed up in museum on French Riviera
text:
Police arrives near Musee Archeologique in Saint-Raphael, France October 23, 2019 in this screen grab taken from a social media video. Video obtained by REUTERS

PARIS (Reuters) - French police said they had arrested a man who had been holed up in a museum in the town of Saint Raphael by the French Riviera.

Police did not give any further details about the arrest on their Twitter page. Earlier media reports said the man had been shouting out threats while inside the museum, triggering a security alert.
description: French police said they had arrested a man who had been holed up in a museum in the town of Saint Raphael by the French Riviera.
